title: Self-Upgrade Fix
description: Binary now owned by service user. Remote upgrades work without sudo after initial setup.

title: CSP Subdomain Fix
description: Apps on same server can now communicate. Enables cross-app data sharing like manifest fetching.

title: Install Script Fix
description: Service file now updated during upgrades. Future remote upgrades work without manual SSH.

title: Peers & Remote Commands
description: All peer config in SQLite. New `fazt remote` commands for native node-to-node communication. Auto-migration from old config.

title: Remote Upgrade Fix
description: Fixed upgrade API failing due to ProtectSystem. Service file now allows /usr/local/bin writes.

title: Auto-detect Service DB
description: create-key command now auto-finds database from systemd service file.

title: Remote Upgrade API
description: POST /api/upgrade endpoint for remote server upgrades with auto-restart.

title: MCP Routes
description: Wired up Model Context Protocol HTTP endpoints. Fixed install script version detection.

title: MCP & Serverless
description: Multi-server client config, MCP server with 5 tools, JavaScript serverless runtime via Goja, analytics dashboard, sites-to-apps migration.

title: Observability & Performance
description: Added system health APIs, analytics buffering for 97% fewer DB writes, site file browsing, and complete traffic config CRUD. Fixed Bearer token auth for CLI.

title: Recursive Seeding
description: Fixed 404s for Admin assets by enabling recursive seeding.

title: Cartridge Admin
description: Admin Dashboard is now hosted in VFS. Frontend converted to SPA. Reset command added.

title: Embedded Assets Fix
description: Fixed missing UI assets in production binaries.

title: Production SSL
description: Installer now correctly requests production SSL certificates.

title: Service Startup Fix
description: Fixed 'auth username required' crash when running as systemd service.

title: Firewall Config Fix
description: Fixed syntax error in UFW command execution during installation.

title: Install Stability
description: Fixed 'text file busy' error during installation on Linux systems.

title: Cartridge Architecture
description: Fully implemented One Binary + One DB philosophy. Config-less.

title: Reserved Routing
description: Implemented admin.*, root.*, and 404.* internal routing logic.

title: Auto Firewall
description: Installer now automatically configures UFW for ports 80/443.

title: Visual Installer
description: Redesigned installation experience with beautiful CLI banners.

title: Security First
description: Auth always required. Secure by default permissions enforced.
